类 RecipeCreateView

java.lang.Object
javafx.stage.Window
javafx.stage.Stage
view.RecipeCreateView
所有已实现的接口:
javafx.event.EventTarget
public class RecipeCreateView extends javafx.stage.Stage
RecipeCreateView is a JavaFX Stage that provides the user interface for creating and editing recipes. This view loads the recipe creation FXML layout and manages the interaction between the UI components and the controller for recipe creation and editing functionality.
从以下版本开始:
1.0

  • 构造器详细资料

    • RecipeCreateView

      public RecipeCreateView()
      Default constructor for creating a new recipe. Initializes the stage with default settings for recipe creation.

    • RecipeCreateView

      public RecipeCreateView(int _editedRecipeId)
      Constructor for editing an existing recipe.
      参数:
      _editedRecipeId - The ID of the recipe to be edited

  • 方法详细资料

    • updateImage

      public void updateImage(String temp)
      Updates the recipe image through the controller.
      参数:
      temp - The image path or URL to update

    • updateNutritionPreview

      public void updateNutritionPreview()
      Updates the nutrition preview display through the controller. This method refreshes the nutritional information shown in the UI.
